name: Slow Storm
description: The Slow Storm is a chaotic elemental characterized by wind and lightning, with a formidable presence and a dynamic appearance that embodies a stormy essence.
memorable: Its ability to unleash static shocks and control an area with wind storms makes it a unique and dangerous foe.
goals: Usually serves as a chaotic force of nature in battle, imposing its will through storms and lightning.
relations: May be found alongside other elemental creatures or as a manifestation of natural chaos.
environment: Typically encountered in stormy or chaotic environments, possibly in open areas where it can unleash its powers.
strengths: Immunity to lightning damage and multiple condition immunities make it difficult to control in combat.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to magical attacks that bypass its resistance to nonmagical damage.
attacks: Can deliver multiple Slam attacks or unleash powerful Lightning Bolts, accompanied by secondary effects like wracking pain.
most_powerful_ability: Static Shock allows it to unleash a devastating area-effect electrical attack that can stun foes.
senses: Blindsight up to 30 feet provides it with the ability to sense its surroundings without relying on sight.
additional_information: Elemental Nature means it doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.
Eye of the Storm creates a challenging wind storm area for opponents.
Its high Constitution score allows it to absorb damage effectively.
Strong Dexterity helps it dodge attacks and enhances its saving throws.
The creature is surrounded by a wind storm that extinguishes flames.
